body:
Hello there!
I'm Ivi,
and I'm doing a new A.M.A.- "Reasons"-
My past AMA was 3 months ago, didn't got replies and now is my 7-months-anniversary. 
So...
Ask me anything!
body_tagged:

and I'm doing a new A.M.A.- "Reasons"-

So...

title: Ivi's New AMA!

replies.body: How do you feel about the Winter update?

replies.body:
For me it is  summer so.... it's hot!
Talking seriously, I am really glad to the staff for hard work on this server for keep the good updates comming

replies.body:
How has your 7 months on Avicus been?
Are you planning on applying for staff?
replies.body_tagged:
How has your 7 months on Avicus been?
Are you planning on applying for staff?

replies.body:
Good! I knew a lot of new great people ♡♥
And yea, I am planning apply for staff! Help in what you can is always fine ;) .

replies.body:
How would you feel if a new dev came to Avicus? 
How are you? 
My new skin or old skin? 
How do you feel about us both having our 7-month anniversary of joining at around the same time? ;o
replies.body_tagged:
How would you feel if a new dev came to Avicus? 
How are you? 
My new skin or old skin? 
How do you feel about us both having our 7-month anniversary of joining at around the same time? ;o

replies.body:
I'd feel very nice because we had more help with the plugins and development. Every help is potentially good.
I'm having some personal trouble that you know.
New one.
I feel like if I have to thank all this great community for make my 7 months stay in this site so much wonderfull and thanks to the staff for always be there making this a better place for all. Thank you, guys. =) ♡♥♡♥♡

replies.body:
I don't wanna be rude but the new application format asks for good grammar.
But don't worry dude, don't let this stop you, just study hard and good things will come :)
